headline.main: Wilmington Trust Deal May Be a Sign of Trouble

abstract: Why should the fate of a bank in one of the tiniest states concern the global banking sector? Delaware is hardly the place to look for broader trends. But the way in which the state's Wilmington Trust was forced to sell to a rival, M&T, could end up haunting the entire industry.
